titleStmt.title: The tragedies of the last age consider'd and examin'd by the practice of the ancients and by the common sense of all ages in a letter to Fleetwood Shepheard, Esq. / by Thomas Rymer, of Grays-Inn, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
